channel.title: Dotaportal Recruting!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dotaportal Recruting!" - Join DP now!

item.title: Re: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded:
Necro post is necro.

Well, so that I won't be rude, we are no longer accepting any applicants. Well, we will not be around for another week, so yeah. Thanks for the reply even though it is 4 months late.

item.title: Re: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded:
Hi there. I'm wondering if you are still in need of new players. If so then I would be very interested to join your village.

I am a very active player and I try to do my part for the sake of the village.

The name is Zeekee and I'm a lvl 77 Sannin.

If there is anything else you might want to know I would be happy to answer your questions.

item.title: Re: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded:
We urgently need members atm. We have the ryo but can't buy Hard Corps because we lack villagers. So if you are looking for an established village, join us now.

Please refer to the village blurb on what our village can offer you.

item.title: Re: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded: We also now have Summons, so you can join if you want them.

item.title: Re: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded: We just acquired Genin and Chunnin Training School so new players can enjoy +1 str. Currently with 29 villagers and hoping to get 6 more so we can buy that Summoning Circle and other upgrades that require 35 villagers. Hope to see you in the village soon.

item.title: Dotaportal Recruting!
item.content:encoded: Dotaportal, The Village Hidden in the Portal, is currently recruiting players to join our village. We're kinda stuck right now due to low number of villagers (currently 25, 30 if we include the non-playing ones). We accept any ninjas of any rank. Please post your application here in this thread, or, if you have an account in Dotaportal.com, post in the BvS thread under Games Discussion. We have the Party House, Jonin Council, War Room, Potions, the three shop upgrades plus General Store, and many more! We also have NRF, so you'll be able to get monster drops if you're lucky! Again, all ranks accepted!
